description:
What is the most expensive Yugioh card? Since releasing in 1999, some rare YuGiOh cards have taken on such a reputation that they sell for tens of thousands of dollars at auction. This guide profiles the 26 most expensive Yugioh cards ever, and how much they sold for.

The most valuable Yugioh cards are a varied bunch. They aren’t necessarily simply the best Yugioh cards available; nor is this list stuffed with ultra-powerful cards from the top Yugioh decks and
title: The 26 most expensive Yugioh cards and prices

description:
While Black Friday 2024 is still more than a week away, there are plenty of early deals on offer, and that’s as true for tabletop games as it is for graphics cards and miniature vacuum cleaners. One of the most tempting board game deals we’ve seen is this half price saving on Spirit Island, which is currently $55 off.

Continue reading It’s not Black Friday yet, but this fantastic board game is already half price

title: It’s not Black Friday yet, but this fantastic board game is already half price

description:
On one level, Warhammer 40,000’s Emperor of Mankind is a cosmic genius, a master of 5D chess who manipulates the strands of fate and fights an endless war against the machinations of the Chaos gods. On another level, he is a clown-shoes bozo who can’t move forwards without stepping on a rake. If you’ve read enough Warhammer 40k lore, the question will surely have passed through your mind - is the Emperor of Mankind an idiot?

Continue reading Warhammer 40k lore: Is the Emperor an idiot?
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Warhammer 40k lore: Is the Emperor an idiot?

description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Screaming Nemesis has seen a slow but significant price rise over the past few weeks. This red spirit card cost $9.50 a month ago, but since then it’s gone up 200%, to a far more impressive $28.60.

Continue reading All-star MTG creature card sees 200% price spike
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates,
title: All-star MTG creature card sees 200% price spike

description:
Every DnD dungeon master wants to immerse their players into the campaign, and audio has a huge role to play. Delving through dank dungeons, chains rattling and footsteps echoing; or amidst a violent battlefield, steel clashing with steel as thousands of voices shout in fury - it all adds to the sense that the players are really there. You can grab $570 (£451.38) worth of gorgeously crafted audio for only $25 (£19.28), thanks to the TTRPG Audio Compendium on Humble Bundle.

Continue reading This TTRPG sound suite is ideal for DnD and now it
title: This TTRPG sound suite is ideal for DnD and now it’s 95% off
